Reviews.Title: Not bad at all, But...
Reviews.Author: TheUnboxingGeek-com "Bryan"
Reviews.Content: The Dell Inspiron 15 i15RV-953BLK is a 15-inch notebook that provides great esthetics in addition to a strong build quality. It is designed for all users, novice and advanced, and is reasonably priced compared to other notebooks in its class.The Inspiron 15 is a quiet but powerful notebook with a sleek appearance and clean design. The screen is vibrant and large for viewing media, with speakers loud enough to fill a room. The Intel Pentium 2127U dual-core processor makes it speedy enough for standard usage and makes it a suitable replacement for a desktop. Its 4 GB of RAM help it keep up with the pricier competition.Build and DesignThe newer Inspiron model provides a sleeker more modern look than older models. It features a hinge design with the screen located in front of the chassis. This allows the user to move the screen closer to the keyboard making the action seem closer. The exterior of the 15R model is very elegant with its screen cover having a brushed metal appearance which gives the look of metal but the flair of a painted surface. The outer surface is actually easier to clean this way. This same design is displayed inside the notebook, on the hand rest and the trim around the keyboard.The shell is built with around a strong chassis with thick, durable plastic. The chassis resists bending and the hand rest and keyboard are supportive, remaining intact under strong pressure. Unlike previous models, the 15R is able to resist screen wiggling back-and-forth or side-to-side. This is largely due to the fact that hinges on each side keep the screen into a firmly locked position, only moving once lifted or closed.Upgrading the hardware is simpler than ever. To perform memory upgrades, there is only one panel on the bottom of the machine. The access panel can be lifted by removing the screw with a Phillips head screwdriver. Accessing the hard drive, however, still requires disassembly of the entire chassis.Display and SpeakersThe screen is 15.6 inches in size, with 1366x768 resolution. It should be noted that the screen's surface is highly reflective for those who prefer matte finishes. The LED screen provides a strong backlight with vivid colors that are optimal if the screen remains in a position within 20 degrees vertically of its standard 90 degree position. Horizontally, the screen can be rotated close to 60 degrees before the reflective surface disrupts the image.The Inspiron's speakers are situated along the edge of the hand rest and operate efficiently when placed on hard, non-porous surfaces. The speaker location could prove to be detrimental, however, if using the notebook on a soft surface such as a couch, bed or lap due to the fact that the speakers could easily be blocked.Ports and FeaturesThe Inspiron 15 offers many connection ports, providing the capability of hosting various media as a desktop replacement notebook. It features two USB 2.0 ports, two USB 3.0 ports, standard audio jacks, an eSATA/USB connection, HDMI, and Ethernet port. It also features an SD card reader and the available Wi-Di adapter allows the user to stream media from the Internet to an outside device.Keyboard and TouchpadThe keyboard features keys that are standard on Dell laptops. They keys are mostly flat with the letters and number pad being slightly concave in the centers. The design is wide enough to feel spacious even with the number pad, yet compact enough to fit all keys in one distinct rectangular space.The notebook features a Synaptics touchpad with a smooth gliding surface that supports multiple sensations at once. The touchpad buttons click softly with little noise.PerformanceThe Intel Pentium 2127U processor with HD graphics can manage any basic activities needed from an inexpensive notebook. While more than suitable for everyday tasks such as web browsing or creating documents, the included graphics processor is not built for hardcore gaming. It is still acceptable for other types of media such as photos or videos.High-definition 720p and 1080p movies can be rendered without lagging or skipping. This benefit comes in handy when using the Intel Wi-Di adapter which is perfect for wirelessly streaming HD videos to an outside TV.Battery LifeThe notebook comes with a 48Wh 6-cell battery. The battery tests in at a 3 hour and 33 minute duration. To extend operating time an additional 9-cell 90WH battery is available.Heat and NoiseThe Inspiron 15 manages heat distribution fairly well, with its only hot spot exceeding 90 degrees under the bottom of the chassis. Temperatures above the chassis stay below 90 degrees Fahrenheit. The laptop's fan steps in to reduce excess heat when needed. The notebook is quiet with minimal noise disturbance.What I like about it?Modern designFast enough for the average userQuiet when clicking or when fan is in useResistant build and durable chassisMultiple ports with multimedia capabilitiesWhat I dislikeProcessor not suitable for faster programs and gamesBattery life could be longerRecommended UserThe Dell Inspiron 15 i15RV-953BLK is ideal for those who need a simple machine that is reliable enough to handle everyday tasks quickly. The sleek design is preferred for users who are concerned with appearance and desire a cleaner, simpler look. For parents with young kids or students who share living space, the lack of noise is an advantage as well. The strong body is helpful for people who have to carry the notebook from place to place multiple times a day.Why should you buy it?The Inspiron 15 offers the durability of a desktop in a portable design. The included Intel Pentium processor fares better than that of many competitors or other Dell machines. It features around the same amount of RAM as more costly notebooks in its class and offers ample storage space. Considering it can be used as a desktop replacement, it comes in at an average weight. All in all, it is a reasonably affordable notebook with more than enough power for users who need only the basics.---------------------------------------------Update 24/10/2013---------------------------------------------------------------So far I am satisfy with this laptop but I found it's really heavy and bulky to bring it to anywhere. This laptop most probably suit to act as a desktop replacement, but mobile enough to act as a backup if you really need a laptop to work elsewhere once in a while.If you are a mobile user or student, I would not recommend you use this as your primary laptop. My two cents.BTW, I also notice that this buyer has shot some close up high def photos which helpful for you to have more idea about it's size and built and design.[...]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I love this computer. I only paid $349, plus an extra $10 for shipping and had it the next day at 10 a.m. after my other laptop's motherboard died. It functions well and looks good. I've purchased other laptops for less than $400 and this one is my favorite. It has a CD player, USB, basically everything you need.

Reviews.Title: You get what you paid for...
Reviews.Author: c.m.o
Reviews.Content: Two days after receiving this computer it would not turn on. I removed the battery (it was already in the laptop when it arrived) and put it back in. After that it did turn on, so I ran a full test to see if their where any problems. At this point I had not download any programs to this laptop. I wait about one week before downloading Microsoft Office. I really needed a computer and this was the third one that I had gotten in a two week period. I did not sent it back and it has been working great most of the time. It still have start up problems sometimes but as long as it last for the next 4 months it will be okay. This computer was under 400 dollars and I did not expect it to be fast or do a lot of thing. The speakers or amazing compared to my last laptop and over all this laptop is very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: loved it!
Reviews.Author: geny
Reviews.Content: i thought this laptop would be cheap because the price was so low (354). It's actually great! Absolutely wonderful! the size is perfect, the screen is stupendous, keyboard is great. its pretty fast too!! Plus it has Bluetooth and a CD drive. I had an acer aspire one which doesn't compare to this laptop. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. :D :D

Reviews.Title: "A Tale of Two Entities"
Reviews.Author: MX2150
Reviews.Content: This is a tale of two entities; the physical hardware and Windows 8(and now 8.1).I bought this computer to replace my wife's 10 year old Dell desktop which was running Windows XP SP3. Too slow and too clunky, she said.At this point I am tempted to digress into the many quirks of Windows 8(like the font spontaneously changing in Outlook or printer availabilty being app dependent) but, nevermind, you can Google these yourselves.A important feature of the hardware is that it does not have a touchscreen; a primary target of Windows 8. So many of the vaunted features of this release are lost on this device.Unless I missed something, this computer arrived with no CD and virtually no documentation. There was a folded, single sheet, quick start user guide which basically says plug in, turn on, follow instructions.Having said that, I have no complaints about the hardware apart for the lack of documentation. It does come up quickly and provides a crisp display for all applications.This computer has been plugged in for about a month yet I noticed that the battery was a little over half charged. After wading through a few menus I discovered this is intentional so as not to tax the NiCad batteries and can be disabled. Maybe they forgot to send me all the documentation.The final twist to this: before I deposited the old Dell to the electronic reycling heap, I decided to clean it up with a program called Defender Pro(available on Amazon for $4). The performance improvement is amazing. In fact, if I had done this first, I might not have bought the Inspiron.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Buy for Your Money!
Reviews.Author: Marie Adams
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent system with great features...user friendly....high technology...efficient and proficient...Allows for great navigation, updates, and help system that is accessible and very informative and allows you to go to the web for assistance and download much needed up days to keep your computer operating at its' best always.

Reviews.Title: Very good laptop
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: This laptop is all what I need. I don't use to run heavy software so because of that I think that with its dual core and 4 GB of RAM it's perfect for most of users. Also looking in the web I found that Processor performance is very similar to Core i3 processor in most of the situations. I'm very happy because it's a very good laptop at an excellent price.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop if you can catch it on sale.
Reviews.Author: Vasinvictor "arkansaurus"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with a ScanSnap to convert physical filing cabinet to digital. My only criteria was 1. cost and 2. Intel, but not Celeron. This computer runs Windows 8 very well and will handle everything 95% of computer users will throw at it. I paid $379 for it 12 days ago (11/20/2013). I've seen it as low as $299, and now it's up to $329. I'm about to purchase another for new client.

Reviews.Title: Great machine
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Lynett
Reviews.Content: it is very quick and responsive.  The touch pad is more responsive than my former HP laptop.  The graphics are great and it has done everything well.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Hendricks
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my father and he loves it. He is a computer nerd and is on the computer everyday.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Griffiths
Reviews.Content: This computer is easy to use, lightweight and has a nice sleek look to it. I am glad I ordered this it is perfect size and has all the application that you would use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent basic laptop
Reviews.Author: Brittany Ryan
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for an inexperienced or experienced user. very sleek design and easy to use. Shipping was really fast too! Would recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: The wireless card in the Inspiron 15's have known issues
Reviews.Author: nlgoins
Reviews.Content: I've been a faithful Dell customer for at least 10 years and had been very happy until this machine.Whatever Dell you buy, make sure the wireless card is not a Dell Wireless 1703. Search the internet for Inspiron 15 dropping wireless signal and you'll see that this an issue experienced by many. The rest of the machine is okay. I'd give it 3/5 stars. But given this wireless card problem and the length of time I've spent with tech support so far, I wish I could give it a 0/5 stars. It wouldn't be a problem if Dell would admit there's an issue but they're very resistant to do so.Mine has had issues dropping the wireless signal since I bought it. Because it is an intermittent problem, you will get a lot of resistance from tech support.Over the course of 3-4 months, multiple calls and chat sessions with tech support, I've been instructed to update the drivers, they've updated the drivers, they fussed with settings, rebootings, BIOS updates, and they came to the conclusion that it was my router (despite telling them no other device I have has had problems). AT&T; replaced the router even though they found no issue with it. Not ten minutes after the AT&T; tech left, my computer dropped the signal.Today Dell finally decided to replace the wireless card. Yes, it took nearly the length of the software warranty for them to finally decide that there is indeed an issue!If you already have this machine and finally reached the point where Dell decides to replace the card, ask them to replace it with a different type. They seem to be okay with this. I'll come back and update this if they try and give me the same type of card and/or if the new card hasn't fixed this.As for the rest of the machine:The mouse is a little inaccurate. You have to focus tap-to-clicks on the far left of the mouse or else it won't pick it up as a tap. It's annoying.The battery life leaves something to be desired. I get 2-3 hours with the power usage being almost at it's minimum.The rest of the machine is fine for what it is. This is a low end laptop so it's no hard core gaming computer.As far as Windows 8 goes:Windows 8 can be tolerable with the start button modification. Windows 8 is widely known as a giant flop but if you're like me and use computers for work and can't limp your Windows 7 machine any longer, you'll have to learn to put up with it. That's a problem with Microsoft though and not the machine.My biggest complaint is the wireless card and how long it has taken for Dell to admit mine is faulty despite the fact that many, many customers are having the same problem. Prior to this, I had always been pleased with Dell computers and their support. My experience with this machine and with Windows 8 has me pricing Apple computers. The amount of wages I've lost because of time spent on this an unable to work is much more than what an Apple would have cost.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed. The old desktop is a dinosaur and just needed to upgrade. Getting used to windows 8, it's not too bad. Have had no problems with Dell products in the past, so decided to purchase this. Love it, fast, portable.

Reviews.Title: Solid machine
Reviews.Author: Thunderstiker
Reviews.Content: This laptop seems like it should have been more expensive. It's a solid structure, it's quiet, the screen is beautiful and the keyboard is almost perfect. Windows 8 sucks though.

Reviews.Title: needed a mouse
Reviews.Author: MARGARET THOMAS
Reviews.Content: it was hard to control the cursor. I bought a mouse and it works really well. it will take some getting used to, the format is different from myDell desktop.

Reviews.Title: Few words about it
Reviews.Author: Jenny Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Few words about it.. good laptop with windows 8.. a little heavy but have all you need to work with a laptop

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Judy Wright
Reviews.Content: Wonderful purchase for a laptop. I'm learning Windows 8 very slowly. I'm happy with theno smudge cover on this, also. Although it isn't the lightweight model, it is much lighter than my last laptop.

Reviews.Title: Inspiron 15 16 inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: P Shinn
Reviews.Content: Lightening fast delivery !!!  packed Beautifully, one draw back - Windows 8 .... found solution "Classic Shell" software makes it look and somewhat operate like Windows 7 - will order from this Seller again !! Thank you for  your service.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value, great product
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Quiros
Reviews.Content: Got this laptop for my 11-year old son, and was a great purchase. Of course this is not a high-end laptop, but for $350 you get a pretty decent CPU, 4GB RAM and 500GB disk. Absolutely great for working on Office documents, browsing the web, playing basic games, etc.Screen size is fine ... maybe a little heavy, but serves its purpose very well.Totally recommended as an entry laptop for basic home use.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Karen A. Messina
Reviews.Content: Came on the date expected and works great!  It is exactly as it was described and is perfect for a teacher!  Overall, we are very happy with the product for the price!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Adriana
Reviews.Content: very good item100 percent recomendedvery happy with iteverything very good describe, really nice computer.i love my new laptop

Reviews.Title: Fine, lived upto it's promo
Reviews.Author: JimG "JimG"
Reviews.Content: I like the machine, it's a bit difficult getting used to a laptop, but manageable. Windows is a problem, like having an overanxious mother trying to help her pre-teen . Give me an updated XP anytime.Bottom line: good machine for the money, got here a day early, worked great. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: DELL Laptop
Reviews.Author: carl
Reviews.Content: have been very well pleased with the laptop, it fits all my needs and has performed as expected..I would recommend

Reviews.Title: opinion
Reviews.Author: HENRYK ZYCZKOWSKI
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this laptop. The casing is made elegantly. Windows 8 works perfectly. All programs open quickly and doskonale.dokonałem good choice.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15
Reviews.Author: Linda L Szurley
Reviews.Content: Received in good condition,  Works very well, even with Windows 8 installed.I will continue to buy Dell Products, they stand behind their computers

Reviews.Title: Great computer, great price
Reviews.Author: Toni Thompson
Reviews.Content: Really great buy for the price. Easy to set up, nice big screen, super fast. I received it 2 days after purchasing. Extremely happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Very light computer
Reviews.Author: David A. Hernandez Colon "Aleco"
Reviews.Content: I don't remember how many Dell laptops I have bought, but this one is memorable. Any complain about this price and too much to say about low weight, enough RAM and half a Terabyte on hard disk. Another great product from DELL

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Jeff Hanna
Reviews.Content: My wife needed a simple non-complicated laptop that provided basic needs.  This laptop fit the bill perfectly!  Pricing was good also!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Working on my hair
Reviews.Content: A good little laptop for a student or someone on the go.  Lightweight, very fast, easy to use.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: low quality touch pad and buttons
Reviews.Author: kristine j hayden
Reviews.Content: while the computer seems to work well, the keyboard, touch pad and mouse buttons are loud and seem of very low quality.

Reviews.Title: Very slow!
Reviews.Author: Arina
Reviews.Content: This is not a good laptop! It is very slow. It seems that something wrong with it because it shouldn't be so slow.  Also the screen is bad- eyes are tired after short time looking at it. It is also very heavy.

Reviews.Title: App's
Reviews.Author: Matthew McDermott
Reviews.Content: Great computer, the only problem I have with it is there is no app's  install with computer to play my  DVD videos automatically.

Reviews.Title: I'm stuck with it.
Reviews.Author: Wolfeboronian
Reviews.Content: I thought the price was good, but it came with Windows-8, and lacked a slot for the memory card.I paid to install Windows 7, and now my computer guru says "It doesn't have very much 'power'". I'll have a friend evaluate this laptop. and may set it aside for one that is better.Even brand new, sometimes it's so slow, it seems like I've returned to dial-up!

Reviews.Title: Good computer
Reviews.Author: Southpaw79
Reviews.Content: So far so good, I'm still learning the new system, but so far it has met all my expectations. I feel like this was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: A nice laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Gloria L. Myers
Reviews.Content: This laptop suits my needs.  I'm not crazy about Windows 8 but I'm slowly getting used to it.  Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: R. M. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the speed of the processor. Windows 8 was challenging to get used to so I highly recommend upgrading for free to Windows 8.1. Windows 8.1 is the best of both worlds and helps you ease into the app-style Windows 8.The only "con" with this laptop is that the built-in Bluetooth sporadically ceases to function.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Sass3
Reviews.Content: This computer is just the thing, however I hate windows 8.  Since I didn't take the time for the instruction video, you could say t's my fault....but I'm set in my ways and can do without window 8.

Reviews.Title: Works as intended
Reviews.Author: J. Varrato
Reviews.Content: Arrived timely and booted up without a problem. This is one of two Dells we own and have not had a hardware related problem. Windows 8 on the other hand is not totally without some issues.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron laptop
Reviews.Author: lxgeorge1
Reviews.Content: Delivery was quick and safe. No Problems with equipment.Only problem is I wish I had purchased with sofware installed and WIFI included.But for the price it is good.

Reviews.Title: Everything has been great except Window 8.  Not a fan yet!
Reviews.Author: Mark James
Reviews.Content: Delivery ahead of schedule.Service great.Support access not good.Software is a pain.  Constant updates.  Just don't like windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Book Mavin "It will be over one day"
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop for my wife. For the price it is a very good deal. She can game, surf the web and do almost everything you need. She just hates windows 8 with a passion but besides that, a good buy

Reviews.Title: I wanted a laptop running windows 7
Reviews.Author: Paul Brunton
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a computer running windows 7.  I did a search on theamazon site, and this was included in the search results.  I thought it would be a windows 7 machine, but when it arrived (my wifes christmas present) it was loaded with windows 8.  Had I realized this (it was stated in the fine print....which I saw too late) I certainly would have gotten a touch screen.  Yes, it was partly my error, but I was not a happy camper, yet did not want to return it.

Reviews.Title: perfect for 14yr old daughter laptop
Reviews.Author: Chris Bingman
Reviews.Content: Our daughter has been using her laptop for online schoolwork, games and browsing constantly since we got it for her - no complaints yet. performance is as expected

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Morgan
Reviews.Content: Shipping was faster than expected. Wonderful computer and I highly recomend it,very fast and easy to opperrate. I'm not completely familiar with windows 8 yet but its not bad :)

Reviews.Title: Very slow....
Reviews.Author: Rick Kaiser
Reviews.Content: Seems to be very slow....windows 8 is hard to navigate around in....no instructions! Do not realize new windows was the OS.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron Is Great
Reviews.Author: Ann Vandiver
Reviews.Content: I have always been satisfied with Dell products. All though I am not as happy with Windows 8 operating system, it could be more user friendly.

Reviews.Title: works well out of the box
Reviews.Author: John Lewis
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 takes some learning if you start with Windows 7.So far (about 3 weeks) of daily use, no problems whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Nice (for a Windows machine ;-))
Reviews.Author: Mikeg
Reviews.Content: My mother is near 80 and has never used a laptop or touchpad before.  I gave her this laptop for Christmas and she loves it!Pros:My mother loves it.Cons:It is not a Mac.If I were to purchase another Windows laptop it would be this one.

Reviews.Title: Annoyed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this laptop for Christmas. It was purchased at OfficeMax. It is overall a really good laptop, but as a google chrome user I am a bit annoyed at the way the browser opens. Seems to take forever and I sometimes have to close my browser and reopen it.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Denise Silverthorne
Reviews.Content: I heard that Windows 8 is horrible--not intuitive, no instructions, you just have to continue to bumble around to find out how to use it.  So I made a point to search on Amazon for laptop Windows 7.  I didn't realize the search results would deliver a few laptops with Windows 8 and that's what I end up choosing and discovered when it was delivered.  I've been trying to make the best of it since then without much success.It would have been nice if the Dell Laptop had come with some instructions.  There is a barely helpful Quick Start guide but otherwise refers you to the internet for assistance (which I couldn't figure out how to get).Also, it seems as though I have to almost bang on the touch pad and the Enter key in order for the laptop to respond.I don't really care for the waffle patterned surface, both inside and out, of the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Love the laptop
Reviews.Author: Betty Ramey
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid, it is a great laptop. I only wish the battery would last much longer, but I'm sure you would have to purchase a more expensive laptop to get that. It does everything I need it to do. I am a novice user and so with a little help from a friend, I am able to navigate Windows 8 without  any problem. I won't download Windows 8.1, because I've had different ones tell me it messed up there computer. Like I said, for the price it is a great laptop, although it is a bit heavy to lug around. If you don't want to spend a lot of money, this is a good buy'

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jackie Flynn
Reviews.Content: Our grandaughter was so very surprised at this wonderful laptop. She is already using it and loving it.. She will be using it with herenglish AP class and American history.

Reviews.Title: cool laptop
Reviews.Author: Amy Brooks
Reviews.Content: The Technology of this device is awesome, I forgot what it was like to work with a new computer and I love it..

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15 il5RV-953BLK 15.6 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Linda Woodson
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my husband for Christmas and he was very pleased with it.  The Windows 8 is still a little problem for us but we are learning thanks to our grandson.  The computer came very quickly, was packaged really well, and was in really good shape.  It came up quickly and has continued to work well.  So far it is much smarter than the owners.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 1
Reviews.Author: warrior
Reviews.Content: Computer work great, fast and stays cool. I just have to get familar with Windows 8. I like the ay it is laid out but have to get use to all of the items o desktop

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Smith
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 13-yr old son. He is very pleased with clarity, speed and ease of use of Win 8.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Hubert W Bonnett
Reviews.Content: Perfect computer for a novice user.  Once 8.1 is downloaded, I had absolutely no problems. Highly recommend this computerfor all levels of use.

Reviews.Title: very good laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: John Partain
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and was a bit nervous about windows 8, but he really likes the OS and has had very little problems adapting to the learning curve with it. Sleek design helps with the weight, processor and screen quality are sufficient for a college student. Overall this is another quality Dell product.

Reviews.Title: Dell is the best!
Reviews.Author: Rosemary N.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself for Christmas and love it! I got it at a very good price! I had a Dell windows 7 for a long time and needed a new computer. It is just perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Everything it promised to be
Reviews.Author: Malaika Pickell
Reviews.Content: The only issue I have with it is a "user error" type issue, trying to figure out how to use Windows 8 and get it to do everything I want it to. I know it can; I just have to figure out how. But that's an issue with ME, not with the laptop. :-)

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 with CD/DVD drive, etc etc
Reviews.Author: pen and paper
Reviews.Content: Bought to replace temporarily an HP Pavilion ruined by a glass of spilled water, I've fallen in love with this light-weight laptop. The people at Dell very patiently walked me through my initial problems & anxieties. For the price, this purchase was a steal. (N.B., The HP's fixed, but I'm still using the Dell.)

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: Adrienne Bell
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my Mom. I set it up for her and liked the colorful screen and ease of use.  I also have a Dell Inspiron laptop.

Reviews.Title: Grand daughter present
Reviews.Author: Mary Jo Buckley
Reviews.Content: Grand daughter needed a new laptop and this one seemed to fit the bill for a 12 year old needs for school work and a nice one for games and every day stuff.

Reviews.Title: "Sleek & awesome"
Reviews.Author: michael ziegler
Reviews.Content: Nice laptop, had an older dell so I decided to stay with dell. Still getting used to windows 8. Great product, good price. Would definetly would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop
Reviews.Author: Robert Starr
Reviews.Content: Laptop arrived quickly and in good condition. Screen is very sharp and the keys are handy and quiet. Processor is much faster than our old HP Celeron processor. Starting to like Windows 8. Would recommend to our friends.

Reviews.Title: Easy to navigate.
Reviews.Author: buck "poco"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good notebook. Easy to use and fast uploads. For the price I am very satisfied. would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent seller
Reviews.Author: Mike Steg
Reviews.Content: Product came as advertised and was perfect condition! No complaints and better pricing then the brick and mortar stores could provide!

Reviews.Title: Great starter computer
Reviews.Author: L T
Reviews.Content: This is a great first owner computer. I bought it because of the price $299 . My previous computer had alot of external ports and an external volume button and a safety opening clasp .This one is sleek and lighter .I must say dell goes all out with their pre packaged softwear . Nice little set up but wait like me till it goes on sale

Reviews.Title: Nice feel and fast shipping...
Reviews.Author: Galan
Reviews.Content: Slim and light with a large screen. Shipped fast and worked perfectly out of the box.  Windows 8 requires new learning, but it is doable. Perfect machine for a non-gaming home use computer.

Reviews.Title: fantastic
Reviews.Author: melissa sinen
Reviews.Content: I love the laptop. it definitely does what I need it to do. its a birthday and Christmas present to myself.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: chance gates
Reviews.Content: It works great probably not a real gamer machine but, for the price,  a great laptop to use at work.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good until now.
Reviews.Author: Sang-Jae Park
Reviews.Content: I feel it a little slow and a little tick tick sound at a quite place, not that noticeable.I have no problem using it until now.

Reviews.Title: I was not informed that 20% would b charged on a returned computer
Reviews.Author: jane forsyth
Reviews.Content: I was not informed that a returned computer would be charged 20% off the original price even if the computer was in perfect condition. Also the shipping was free to me but the seller charged 20%+$14. to take the computer back. I paid $390.98 for the computer and received credit for $298.40.!!!!

Reviews.Title: As expected but Windows 8 awful !!
Reviews.Author: 4 my cubs
Reviews.Content: We bought this to replace a Toshiba that was having issues.  Dell a great product but we ended up returning this laptop because of the Windows 8 on it.  We were able to get our Toshiba up and running again but know that if it does crash for good we will get a laptop with earlier version of Windows!!

Reviews.Title: Computer compromsed
Reviews.Author: Richard Aksamit
Reviews.Content: The computer was immediately compromised after we turned it on and fllled out the information to make it work including the virus program that's when the compromise took effect and started eliminating programs and data from the computer according to Microsoft tech that was working on fixing the computer. The detected the compromise to a hacker in London England. His assessment was that  it was attached to the MacAfee virus program so they could acess the computer before the program was fully installed. The computer ids working fine now but it cost a additional $400.oo to get it working

Reviews.Title: My 13 year olds first laptop
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: So far it's perfect for schoolwork and fun. He loves it, battery life is good, it seems to be fast enough. Well worth the small price.

Reviews.Title: The fan is noisy but overall pretty good laptop
Reviews.Author: Kamen D.
Reviews.Content: I like it an all but the fan noise is really annoying, its loud and its always buzzing even when I start the laptop.

Reviews.Title: WE LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
Reviews.Author: Lorri Mac Ilvaine
Reviews.Content: THE COMPUTER WAS INEXPENSIVE, SHIPPED QUICKLY AND HAS FABULOUS FEATURES!  THE SCREEN SIZE IS ALSO A HUGE PLUS!  IT DOES NOT HAVE MICROSOFT OFFICE INSTALLED; HOWEVER, FOR THE PRICE, IT WILL BE PURCHASED AT A LATER DATE!GREAT BUY!

Reviews.Title: christmas gift
Reviews.Author: howmac
Reviews.Content: My wife loved the gift. It is a good holiday gift.Overall good.Don't understand why there is a word limit on comments

Reviews.Title: Switching to MAC
Reviews.Author: Sara K. Drake
Reviews.Content: My real problem with this computer is the Windows 8 installed on it. I have spent a couple of months trying to get used to this ridiculous operating system. I will never purchase a PC again. My productivity has dropped and I never even want to log on to this computer. The app functionality doesn't work properly unless you have a touch screen and I can't even figure out how to do basic things like minimize windows. I hate windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Great computer...shipping was a little iffy
Reviews.Author: Angela M. Neeley
Reviews.Content: The computer has been great, works great, but from the box it was shipped in that was a surprise.  The box was oversized & there was only a couple bubble bombs for protection, so it rattled around the entire time.  But, it shipped fast & although I was unimpressed with the care taken to package the laptop, it did make it here safely.

Reviews.Title: Kinda old to learn this stuff!
Reviews.Author: Barbara Peterson
Reviews.Content: Much better than the old one I had. Trying to adapt to the changes in the way it operates.Definitely faster and much brighter than the old one! Working on it as I can.

Reviews.Title: NOT a fan of Win8
Reviews.Author: MT Madman "MT Madman"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife while the pc is just fine and despise Windows 8 but then I don't have or use tablets so I'm sure that's the problem where my wife uses them both at home and at work.

Reviews.Title: my laptop doesnt turn on - only used for 7 days
Reviews.Author: Monty
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my wife and she only used for  days and now, it doesnt even turn on. It is horrible

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: guerlyne hyppolite
Reviews.Content: This gift was for my 8yr old and he loves it. It is his independents, he is like a big boy. Whenever he want to look up something he just use his Dell laptop instead of the home computer and he watch movies on it with his other 2 brothers. Awesome gift.

Reviews.Title: hate windows 8
Reviews.Author: Karen Mcclay
Reviews.Content: do not like windows 8 maybe after used to will change mind.  i had windows 7 we liked it better

Reviews.Title: dont buy , Dell Inspiron 15 i15RV-953BLK 15.6-Inch Laptop (Black)!!!!
Reviews.Author: JULIO CESAR LOZADA
Reviews.Content: lapto buy this black Friday Christmas gift for my wife and came to Venezuela in Latin America 30 days, the first day to use the battery in less than 3 hours, the second day would not start was downloaded, not loading and does nothing! ! lost 370 dollars on a computer even step quality control as I get my hands with fatal flaw, as I do to fix this serious problem??

Reviews.Title: Dell inpsiron 15 15RV-953
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Touch Pad  gives lot of hard sound,very irritating. I have now decided always buy  good models regardless of the price,never go for cheap deals, they have low priced items installed in them.

Reviews.Title: I wanted to love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin M. Reeverts
Reviews.Content: It came with issues, It seemed like a decent laptop, a bit bulky but it would have worked. Unfortunately, I opened it and it had issues with the screen from the start. Disappointing because I needed it for a trip I'm taking this Friday.
